Message:
Commander Paladea,
I wanted to become you.

I wanted to become just
like you—a powerful flame
that could protect the people.

But, there was no need for
me to become any of that.

There’s already a fire
burning inside me.

On that day, you gave me
a beautiful, white flame,

As long as it doesn’t die out,
I will not stray from my path.

That blindingly straight,
gentle light is the justice
I long admired.

That’s why I’m going to
hold fast to my brand of justice.
Even if that means fighting you...

My cannon responds
to my determination.
Within it stirs a fire—
quiet, powerful, and true.

“For the sake of the future
you fought to protect,
I will defeat you right
where you stand!”
